name: Stellar Praxis (Canceled)
blurb: Stellar Praxis is a real-time, space adventure/strategy game, set in a 4X space civ universe.

rewards.reward: No Reward

THE STELLAR SOCIETY AWARD
==============================
Includes:==============================
Thank you on our game's website StellarPraxis.com and on the blog. ==============================
Every new backer contributes toward revealing the "macro-picture."

STELLAR CITIZENSHIP AWARD
==============================
Includes: 
                                                          
============================== Will be listed, with thanks, as a "Backer" in the game's credits.

============================== Receive a "Backer" avatar badge representing the game race of your choice for the Stellar Praxis forums.
==============================Participation in "Backer-only" events after the Kickstarter.
==============================Subscription to the Stellar Praxis e-mail newsletter.
==============================Priority access to Open Beta.
==============================Also includes: All Stellar Society rewards.

STELLAR COLONIST AWARD\r\n==============================A thank you e-mail from one of the developers of your choice. ==============================A digital autographed postcard from the whole development team. ==============================Exclusive background image for PC, Mac, and Tablet.\r\n==============================Also includes: Stellar Citizenship rewards.

EARLY ENLISTMENT AWARD ==============================

Invitation to contribution events
==============================A download code for digital copy of the game
==============================The “Enlisted Art Bundle”: a bunch of high quality concept and game art from planning and development
==============================Access to the closed Beta
==============================Digital manual
==============================Also includes: Stellar Colonist rewards

IMPERIAL ENLISTMENT AWARD ==============================  Invitation to contribution events ==============================A download code for digital copy of the game ==============================The \u201cEnlisted Art Bundle\u201d: a bunch of high quality concept and game art from planning and development ==============================Access to the closed Beta ==============================Digital manual\r\n==============================Also includes: Stellar Colonist rewards
EXO-SOLDIER AWARD  ==============================\r\nThe Stellar Praxis Kickstarter Backer T-shirt\r\n==============================Also includes: Imperial Enlistment rewards

QUANTUM CITIZEN AWARD ==============================
Quantum Digital Deluxe version of game including:
“Sounds in Space”* - score and soundtrack,
“Stellar Mysteries”* - strategy guide and art book,
and exclusive backers-only in-game content.
*Name might be subject to change
==============================Also includes: Imperial Enlistment rewards

STELLAR SATRAP AWARD ============================== 
Invitation to a special live event 
==============================Will be listed, with thanks, as a “Contributor” in the game's credits
============================== Also includes: Quantum Citizen rewards

STELLAR SENATOR AWARD
============================== 
Autographed photograph of the development team
==============================Also includes: Stellar Satrap rewards

GALACTIC MEDAL OF SERVICE AWARD
============================== 
Your photo on the Stellar Praxis website
==============================Digital color version of game-based comic, designed by the development team's Lead Writer and Lead 2D Artist
==============================Also includes: Stellar Satrap rewards
GALACTIC MEDAL OF HONOR AWARD ============================== \r\n3d logo pin of an in-game Faction\r\n==============================Also includes: Galactic Medal of Service rewards

GALACTIC HERALD AWARD ============================== 
Signed copy of game manual 
==============================Signed copy of game-based comic (color version)
==============================Also includes: Galactic Medal of Service rewards

PARAGON AWARD
============================== 
3d logo pin of an in-game Faction (Your choice)
==============================Fold up glossy poster of a race’s home system (Your choice) 
==============================4-inch plastic model of in-game ship (Your choice)
==============================Also includes: Galactic Medal of Service rewards

MINISTER OF PROPAGANDA AWARD
============================== 
Signed copy of game manual
==============================Signed copy of game-based comic (color version) 
==============================3d logo pin of an in-game Faction  (Your choice)
==============================Fold up glossy poster of a race’s home system (Your choice)
==============================4-inch plastic model of in-game ship (Your choice)
==============================Also includes: Galactic Medal of Service rewards

GALACTIC COUNCILOR AWARD
============================== 
Unique art piece from either Chris (Lead 2D Artist) or Jay (Lead 3D Artist)
==============================Your likeness included in the game as an NPC, and your name listed, with thanks, as “Character Model” in game Credits
==============================Invitation to live stream of 30-minute monthly development video conference
==============================Also includes: Galactic Medal of Service rewards

GALACTIC MOGUL AWARD
============================== 
Digital copy of game script
==============================Digital copy of game Design Document
==============================Complimentary lunch in person or via web cam (we’ll order you food from a restaurant in your area, if reasonable) during a development meeting to discuss and provide feedback on the game
==============================Also includes: Galactic Councilor rewards

GALACTIC VICEROY AWARD
============================== 
Your likeness in the game as a PC face option, and your name listed, with thanks, as “Character Model” in game Credits
==============================The pin and model from the Minister of Propaganda rewards will be hand-painted by one of the developers (your choice, but we recommend Jay or Rob!)
==============================Also includes: Galactic Mogul and Minister of Propaganda rewards

GALACTIC OLIGARCH AWARD\r\n==============================\u2022Invitation to the special wrap party to be held on a date  announced when game is funded (air fare and accommodations not included)\r\n==============================Also includes: Galactic Mogul rewards

GALACTIC PRINCE AWARD
============================== 
The development team will work with you to create in-game content (a ship model, a technology, etc.).  You will also have the privilege of naming this content (within reason).  You will be given the appropriate listing in the game credits.
==============================Honorary membership in the development team, with appropriate accreditation in the game.  You will receive, and be able to provide, ongoing feedback in the development process, and have access to certain proprietorial game material (Non-disclosure agreement required)
==============================Email account in the development team email client
==============================Also includes: Galactic Oligarch rewards

GALACTIC EMPEROR AWARD
============================== 
Special rewards customized to you.  For example, one or more members of the development team will visit your home or hometown to cook a meal, run a tabletop role-playing game, participate in a snowball fight, etc.  This award is flexible and open to discussion, weighted mainly by your preference.
==============================Also includes: Galactic Prince rewards
